name: Don't Hit Blocks! [Android]
description:
A game that will put your dexterity to the test. A true finger twisting experience! Can you pass all the Levels?

- How it's done -

The game is simple. There are 4 Lanes.

You are the Blue Disc and you can teleport to any Lane by touching it.

Avoid Blocks. Reach the Finish Line. Sounds easy?

It's not.

- Watch your speed -

To make things even more fun (and difficult) the game features Speed Zones. Red ones will make you go faster while the blue ones will slow you down.

By passing Levels you will unlock new and even harder ones! Enjoy :)
